title: Keyboard and files broke recently...
creator: carlrgoodwin
content: Up until a few days ago, the app worked fine. Now, whenever I try to click on "share" (say for a Wikipedia article), the keyboard doesn't show, unless I press the "To" button. The keyboard ALWAYS came up automatically before a few days ago. Also, at the same time, when I try to send (for example) pictures, only ONE will get sent. The other aren't included in the email, and there is only ONE attachment. I'm not sure if the problem is related, but it's a weird coincidence. All this started about 3 days ago, and I'm not sure eif it updated or not, but I'm using version 10. Thanks in advance!

title: Material colour design - when? also reminder for support of full conversations threading like in Gmail
creator: rafnov
content: Set to default system, colours in Thunderbird are based on black, while other apps can set up colours like in Android 13 - material or sth. Not sure the name. I just mean system colours are picked up from wallpaper and I have already my own set of colours that apply to most apps but not Thunderbird. My question is: when TB will support this? Should I post this as feature request? I've posted once, about full threading, but not many replies there
